Title: Search for hc →π+π-J /ψ via ψ (3686) →π0π+π-J /ψ
Abstract: © 2018 authors.Using a data sample of 448.1×106 ψ(3686) events collected with the BESIII detector operating at the BEPCII, we perform search for the hadronic transition hc→π+π-J/ψ via ψ(3686)→π0hc. No signals of the transition are observed, and the upper limit on the product branching fraction B(ψ(3686)→π0hc)B(hc→π+π-J/ψ) at the 90% confidence level (C.L.) is determined to be 2.0×10-6. This is the most stringent upper limit to date.
